tweet_text: We have this cultural hang up about graphic depictions of sex ("purple prose" or not) when it's part of the narrative about a loving relationship. If it's porn for porn's sake, or reflecting trauma (rape on screen) or just dysfunctional/sad, we're good with it. Puritanism, maybe?

tweet_text: @talesofbee Hello, all riders, employees, and customers alike are required to wear a mask. To track down specific issues, we need to know when and where they happened. You can submit those details here https://t.co/TYmdY7QP2S, and they’ll get to the right team.  ^JG
